https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4N5rJJQkcEFi9Z3WSAseEQlgx2s.jpg When Detecive Max Garrett is assigned to protect the sultry photographer Laura Cross from a ruthless killer, he has no idea what he's in for. The more involved Garrett gets in the case, the more attracted he is to Cross, but as they get closer, so does the killer. Bound by Lies
